We all want the interfaith, intercultural relationships to be solved on a solid basis (cont) http://t.co/t5AZOGRaey
For centuries Azerbaijan has been a Homeland for representatives of all nations living in the world.
We are proud that today Azerbaijan is a multi-national and multi-confessional country.
Here, representatives of all religions, all nations, live as a family in peace, kindness and mutual understanding.
This is our great asset, our great advantage, and I think that this factor has played a part in the successful development of Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijan is not only a multinational and multi-confessional country, but also one of the rarest countries in Europe (cont) http://t.co/xmzRytwIEU

Those who live in Taksim are not only Trip Park events. These events are events with external and internal connections.
Behind this incident is the CHP mentality and extremes. Our citizens should not come to this game.
The pot pan is always the same air we saw before.
Those who can not defeat the AK Party in these ways, how do I defeat the AK Party is doing its plans.
We are upright but do not stand up. There have been many things in this country. Astims are poisoned, but we will take some things and walk to the future.
We will continue to pursue our love of nobility.
Turkish spring is happening in Turkey, the saying is true. Yes, there is a spring and they will not turn it into winter.
Tragic, touching story but fantastic news that Simon Cramp has now woken up. Remember one punch can kill. JG
The independent Azerbaijan state is built on strong national and spiritual values.
At the same time, the influence of Europe in various times, especially from the XIX century, was strong enough.
The development of multiculturalism, the successful future of intercultural dialogue, and thus, in the world (cont) http://t.co/TTp15ROnFQ
Multiculturalism existed throughout centuries in Azerbaijan. We simply did not get acquainted with this phrase in the past.
I'm about to chair initial meeting of taskforce to tackle extremism - vital that we challenge radicalisation wherever it occurs.
The development of multiculturalism is important for every nation, every state.
Especially for Azerbaijan, which is a victim of ethnic cleansing.
Because of the low level of multiculturalism trends, Azerbaijan's lands have been occupied.
The soonest settlement of the conflict is a sign of respect for international law, on the one hand, the restoration of historical justice on the other.

@kjetilba @olvew Norway's climate neutrality target will be used to get other countries with limits on how far ahead we should be.
@steinolav @olvew @kjetilba Yes, absolutely. Putting a cloak on emissions and making sure that it costs to pollute gives the greatest cut in emissions.
@hansmyraune @kjetilba @olvew Norway accelerates our climate neutrality from 2050 to 2030 if more countries commit to reducing emissions.
@Olvew @hansmyraune @kjetilba You have a point there. Therefore, we overstate Kyoto with 10% by buying quotas. More purchases provide increased price.
